In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift among the young population in their investment preferences. Traditionally, people have relied heavily on income from service sectors, such as IT, finance, and healthcare. However, a growing number of young individuals are now exploring alternative sources of sustainable income, including investments in commercial properties. This trend is driven by the long-term benefits and profitable possibilities offered by commercial investments, particularly in sectors like the New Gurgaon.


One of the primary reasons for the rising interest in commercial property investment is the stability and potential for significant returns it offers. Unlike residential properties, commercial properties, such as shop cum office spaces (SCO plots), provide multiple income streams. These properties can be leased to businesses, entrepreneurs, and retailers, ensuring a steady rental income. Furthermore, commercial investments tend to appreciate over time, providing substantial capital gains for investors.


New Gurgaon, with its booming economy and vibrant business environment, has emerged as one of the best opportunities for commercial space investments. Among these, the commercial projects by Signature Global stand out as attractive options for first-time property buyers. Here is the Top 10 Commercial property in Gurgaon by Signature Global that you can invest in:



Signature Global Signum Plaza 93, located in one of the poshest sector 93 Gurgaon, Signum Plaza 93 is a hotspot for potential customers. It is a 5 story commercial high-street retail, leisure, and entertainment venue designed to be a lifestyle communal destination, offering a one-stop solution for the needs of residents and surrounding neighbors.


Similarly, Signature Global Signum Plaza 79B is located at Sector 79B, Gurgaon is an attractive investment option that caters to the rising demand for retail space in the rapidly developing area. The project provides a diverse range of retail shops that offer high-quality shopping experiences. From fashion and accessories to electronics and groceries, Signum Plaza 79B ensures that it meets the requirements of different customers.



Signature Global Signum Plaza 81, strategically located in sector 81 Gurgaon, captures the attention of affluent customers in its immediate catchment area. The commercial property stands out for its audacious aesthetics and serves as a relevant destination for various demographics. With its proximity to key employment hubs like Cyber City, Udyog Vihar, Golf Course Extension Road, Sohna, and Manesar, Signum Plaza 81 attracts a diverse customer base, further enhancing its investment potential.


Signature Global Signum Plaza 92 presents another appealing option for commercial shops in Gurgaon. It caters to a catchment area of prosperous customers and offers high-end facilities and features. With its planned location and modern aesthetics, Signature Global Signum Plaza 92 provides a one-roof destination for individuals with different preferences, be it necessity shopping or leisure activities at sector 92 Gurgaon.



Signature Global Signum Plaza 37D is another commercial project by Signature Global that caters to an immediate catchment of well-off customers. Its planned location and gallant aesthetics make it a relevant destination for varying demographics of society, from necessity shoppers to those seeking leisure activities. The project benefits from its proximity to key employment hubs like sohna road and Manesar, making it an attractive investment opportunity. With easy access to Hero Honda Chowk and Dwarka Expressway, Signum Plaza 37D is located at Signature Global city 37d one of the best premium floors project in sector 37D Gurgaon and offers well-designed retail shops in Gurgaon.


Signature Global Signum 37D-IV, strategically located near Dwarka Expressway, caters to the daily needs of residents and consumers while providing a wide variety of stores and a holistic shopping experience. These high-quality, low-maintenance shops present an excellent investment opportunity located at sector 37D Gurgaon. The project’s prime location and the demographics of its target consumers indicate a promising business potential for the affordable commercial shops in Gurgaon.



Signature Global Signum Plaza 63A introduces a uniquely structured high-street retail hub within a residential project. This commercial property in Gurgaon offers a mix of daily needs stores and top-notch branded outlets, catering to both everyday buyers and high-end shopaholics. Surrounded by a well-established premium residential locale and in close proximity to significant landmarks in Gurgaon, Signum Plaza 63A benefits from its strategic location of sector 63A Gurgaon and near top-rated schools, hospitals, IT hubs, and business arcades. Its accessibility to Golf Course Road, Sohna Road, and the Southern Peripheral Expressway via NH-8 adds to its appeal among residents.



Signature Global Signum Plaza 4 is a highly sought-after commercial project in Sohna. It’s a combination of uniquely designed shops located in Signature Global Park 4&5 residential complex in Sector 36 Sohna, south of Gurgaon. These retail shops in Sohna cater to a large pool of consumers and are considered one of the best commercial projects in the area. Strategically located on the Delhi-Mumbai Corridor, these high-quality, low-maintenance shops offer an excellent investment opportunity.


Signature Global SCO Plot 36 Sohna is a unique commercial property in Sohna offering high returns on investment. A 5.21-acre real estate concept that offers space for offices and shops. These commercial plots are located at sector 36 Sohna South of Gurgaon. Comprise low-rise developments that can be built over multiple floors, providing a perfect space to establish and develop businesses. Well-connected to Sohna-Gurgaon Road and the Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor Project (DMIC), this project is surrounded by luxury residential complexes, affordable housing, and renowned schools, colleges, and universities.



Signature Global Infinity Mall located where the Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor starts, is a landmark in the south of Gurgaon. It caters to over five lakh affluent families and skilled professionals, offering upscale retail and entertainment experiences. Infinity Mall is Located in sector 36 Sohna South of Gurgaon. The Signature Global Infinity Mall is surrounding by the various residential projects, schools, universities, hotels, and hospitals.


These commercial property in Gurgaon provide excellent investment opportunities due to the reliability of the Signature Global brand and their strategic connectivity. The new sectors in Gurgaon, especially those closer to Delhi airport via Dwarka Expressway, enjoy good connectivity, making rental commercial properties in these areas highly desirable.
